name: Northwest Pipe Company
description: Northwest Pipe Company is a leading manufacturer of engineered steel pipe products and provides a range of solutions for water infrastructure and industrial applications. Established in 1966, the company has built a reputation for quality and innovation in the pipe manufacturing industry. Northwest Pipe specializes in the production of welded steel pipe and has a diverse portfolio that includes products for water transmission, wastewater treatment, and industrial applications. The company's products are critical for various sectors, including municipal, agricultural, and industrial markets. With a strong commitment to sustainability, Northwest Pipe focuses on delivering products that contribute to efficient water management and environmental stewardship. The company operates multiple manufacturing facilities across the United States, leveraging advanced technology and skilled craftsmanship to ensure the highest quality standards in its products. Northwest Pipe is dedicated to supporting its customers through exceptional service and technical expertise, helping to solve complex infrastructure challenges while promoting safe and reliable water distribution systems. The company continues to expand its capabilities and product offerings to meet the evolving needs of its diverse customer base.
